name: college-edtech-backend
description: Backend API for College EdTech Platform

scripts.check-port: node -e "import('net').then(net => { const server = net.createServer(); server.listen(5000, () => { console.log('Port 5000 is available'); server.close(); }); server.on('error', () => { console.log('Port 5000 is in use'); process.exit(1); }); })"
